text:
How to (finally) access Photoshop inside ChatGPT.

(a quick step-by-step guide)

1. Open ChatGPT and go to Settings > Apps & Connectors
2. Select Adobe Photoshop, then click Connect
3. Once connected, type @AdobePhotoshop to invoke the app
4. Upload your image and type in a prompt like “Apply a cool effect to my photo”
5. Use the sliders to change detail. Make it look exactly how you want.

Prompting tips for best results:
✦  Be clear and specific about what you want.
✦  If you do not want a certain color or style, say so.
✦  Add extra details to get the exact look you need.
✦  Work step-by-step. Focus on one effect at a time. 

Create unique edits fast, with no design skills needed.

Editing photos in Adobe with ChatGPT is now fast, easy, and personal.

✦ I partner with Adobe to teach the How to AI.
✦ Repost this video ♻️ to help others discover it.
